Package islandtrader.core

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
islandtrader.core.Entity
islandtrader.core.Ship
public class Ship
extends Entity
Class that models a Ship.
Author:
Maria Heloisa Balzaretti

  • Constructor Details

    • Ship

      public Ship​(int idNumber, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, double sailSpeed, double cargoCapacity, int numberOfCrew, int endurance, int sneakiness)
      Creates a Ship object
      Parameters:
      idNumber - id number
      name - name
      description - description
      sailSpeed - sail speed
      cargoCapacity - cargo capacity in Kg
      numberOfCrew - number of crew the ship takes
      endurance - endurance / resistance capacity of the ship
      sneakiness - Suppose to help escape from pirates

  • Method Details

    • getNumberOfCrew

      public int getNumberOfCrew()
      Gets the number of crew that this ship takes.
      Returns:
      number of crew

    • getCrewCostToSailDaily

      public double getCrewCostToSailDaily()
      Gets the crew cost to sail daily, the Trader needs to pay the crew wages before sailing.
      Returns:
      the number of crew times the individual crew cost

    • getCrewCostToSailByTotalDays

      public double getCrewCostToSailByTotalDays​(int days)
      gets the Crew cost to Sail by the total days needed to get to the Island
      Parameters:
      days - sailing
      Returns:
      crew cost daily times the number of days in the route

    • getCurrentHealthStatus

      public double getCurrentHealthStatus()
      Gets the Current Health status of the Ship. if it is less than 100% the ship must be fixed before it can sail again, also used to calculate the cost to fix the Ship.
      Returns:
      currentHealthStatus

    • applyDamageToCurrentHealthStatus

      public void applyDamageToCurrentHealthStatus​(double amountDamage)
      Applies damage from RandomEvent Unfortunate Weather to the Ship
      Parameters:
      amountDamage - applied to ship health

    • repair

      public void repair()
      Repairs the Ship by setting the currentHealthStatus to 100%

    • isAbleToSail

      public boolean isAbleToSail()
      Checks that the Ship is able to sail
      Returns:
      ableToSail

    • setAbleToSail

      public void setAbleToSail​(boolean ableToSail)
      Sets the Ship ability to sail, when the ships takes damage it is set to false
      Parameters:
      ableToSail - true or false

    • getSailSpeed

      public double getSailSpeed()
      Gets the sail speed of this ship.
      Returns:
      sail speed

    • setSailSpeed

      public void setSailSpeed​(double sailSpeed)
      Sets the sail speed of this ship.
      Parameters:
      sailSpeed - this ship speed

    • increaseSpeed

      public void increaseSpeed​(int increaseBy)
      Increases the ship speed by the given amount Applied when a relevant upgrade is bought
      Parameters:
      increaseBy - the amount to increase the ship speed

    • decreaseSpeed

      public void decreaseSpeed​(int decreaseBy)
      Decreases speed to remove any upgrades that the Trader has and wishes to sell back.
      Parameters:
      decreaseBy - the amount to decrease the ship speed

    • getCargoCapacity

      public double getCargoCapacity()
      Gets the cargo capacity in Kg of this ship.
      Returns:
      cargo capacity

    • setCargoCapacity

      public void setCargoCapacity​(double cargoCapacity)
      Sets the cargo capacity of this ship to the given parameter. Used under upgrades in store.
      Parameters:
      cargoCapacity - cargo capacity increase to:

    • increaseCargoHoldCapacity

      public void increaseCargoHoldCapacity​(double increaseBy)
      Increases the amount of Kgs the Ship cargo can carry, when Trader buys a relevant upgrade
      Parameters:
      increaseBy - the amount to increase of cargo capacity

    • decreaseCargoHoldCapacity

      public void decreaseCargoHoldCapacity​(double amountToDecrease)
      Used to calculate the capacity in use with the current goods.
      Parameters:
      amountToDecrease - the amount to decrease of cargo capacity

    • getNewCargoHoldCapacity

      public double getNewCargoHoldCapacity​(double amountUpgrade)
      Trader can see the amount applied before buying an upgrade
      Parameters:
      amountUpgrade - the amount of the new cargo capacity
      Returns:
      the new cargo capacity if upgrade is applied

    • getEndurance

      public int getEndurance()
      Gets the endurance / resistance capacity of this ship.
      Returns:
      endurance

    • setEndurance

      public void setEndurance​(int endurance)
      Sets the endurance of this ship to the given parameter. Used under upgrades in the store.
      Parameters:
      endurance - this endurance to be set

    • increaseEndurance

      public void increaseEndurance​(int amountEndurance)
      Increase endurance of Ship when Trader buys a relevant upgrade to the Ship
      Parameters:
      amountEndurance - the amount to increase of endurance

    • decreaseEndurance

      public void decreaseEndurance​(int amountEndurance)
      Decreases the amount of endurance when Trader decides to sell the upgrade back.
      Parameters:
      amountEndurance - the amount to decrease of endurance

    • getNewEndurance

      public int getNewEndurance​(int amountEndurance)
      The trader can see the new Endurance before buying the upgrade
      Parameters:
      amountEndurance - the amount to upgrade endurance
      Returns:
      endurance updated with the amountEndurance

    • getSneakiness

      public int getSneakiness()

      Returns:
      sneakiness

    • setSneakiness

      public void setSneakiness​(int sneakiness)
      Sets this ship sneakiness to the given parameter.
      Parameters:
      sneakiness - this sneakiness to set

    • increaseSneakiness

      public void increaseSneakiness​(int increaseBy)
      Increase sneakiness of this ship by the given parameter. Decreases if the given parameter is negative.
      Parameters:
      increaseBy - the amount to increase the sneakiness

    • decreaseSneakiness

      public void decreaseSneakiness​(int decreaseBy)
      Decrease sneakiness of Ship when Trader sells some upgrade that previously increased the Sneakiness of the Ship
      Parameters:
      decreaseBy - amount to decrease the sneakiness

    • addTradable

      public void addTradable​(StoreTradable tradable)
      adds StoreTradable to the collection of current StoreTradables available for trade.
      Parameters:
      tradable - to be added to current goods

    • removeTradable

      public void removeTradable​(StoreTradable tradable)
      removes the StoreTradable from the collection of current StoreTradables when Trader sells it.
      Parameters:
      tradable - to be removed from current goods

    • removeAllCargoTradables

      public void removeAllCargoTradables()
      Removes all StoreTradables from the collection of current StoreTradables when a RandomEvent Pirate takes all Trader goods.

    • getSoldCargoTradables

      Returns:
      soldCargoTradables

      Parameters:
